content.en: Full-Duplex Algorithms: Researchers have proposed various algorithms to address challenges in full-duplex wireless communication, such as handling transmitter IQ imbalance, estimating self-interference and intended channels, compensating for transmitter leakage pollution, and efficiently canceling self-interference. These algorithms utilize techniques like widely linear filtering, maximum-likelihood estimation, joint estimation, compressed sensing, blind source separation, and adaptive algorithms to achieve effective self-interference cancellation and improve overall system performance. By applying these algorithms, researchers aim to suppress self-interference and enable simultaneous transmission and reception in full-duplex communication systems.
content.da: Fuld-dupleks-algoritmer: Forskere har foreslået forskellige algoritmer for at tackle udfordringerne i fuld-dupleks trådløs kommunikation, såsom håndtering af transmitter IQ-ubalance, estimering af selv-interferens og tilsigtede kanaler, kompensation for transmitter lækageforurening og effektiv annullering af selv-interferens. Disse algoritmer anvender teknikker som bredt lineær filtrering, maksimum-likelihood-estimering, fælles estimering, komprimeret sensing, blind kildeseparation og adaptive algoritmer for at opnå effektiv selv-interferensannullering og forbedre systemets samlede ydeevne. Ved at anvende disse algoritmer sigter forskerne mod at undertrykke selv-interferens og muliggøre samtidig transmission og modtagelse i fuld-dupleks kommunikationssystemer.
